response.original_title: Light Man, superhero the new york city saviour
response.overview: Introducing a short animation called Light Man – Superhero, with a series of adventures that form an intense introduction to Light Man and Light Woman, and their adventures within New York City. It is an elegantly simple and fun animation to see, giving a glimpse in to the daily adventures of this popular ‘Superhero’.
response.title: Light Man, superhero the new york city saviour
